scripts.comment02: npm watch is at localhost/baby...., NOT at :8080
scripts.comment03: prebuild creates an importable version number
scripts.prebuild: node -p "'export const LIB_VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';'" > src/version.ts  && cp ../../jsxgraph/distrib/jsxgraphcore.js lib
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && rm -rf dist.1.17/ && tsc --noEmit && webpack --config webpack.player.dev.js && npm run copylib2d && npm run copy2moodle && npm run copy2playground
scripts.buildproduction: npm run prebuild && rm -rf dist.1.17/ && tsc --noEmit && webpack --config webpack.player.prod.js && npm run copylib2d && npm run copy2moodle && npm run copy2playground && npm run copy2wrapper
scripts.copylib2d: cp -R lib/*.* dist.1.17 && cp -R lib/fonts dist.1.17 && cp -R lib/bootstrap dist.1.17 && cp -R src/tsxgraph.* dist.1.17
scripts.buildeditor: rm -rf dist.1.17_editor && webpack --config webpack.editor.config.js && npm run copyeditor
scripts.copyeditor: cp src_editor/runtime/index.php dist.1.17_editor/index.php  && cp src_editor/runtime/3d.css dist.1.17_editor && cp -R assets dist.1.17_editor/assets
